body_html:
Same problem (Pascal, GTX 1060):

import torch
x = torch.randn(4,5)
x.cuda()

takes forever (15 minutes in a real-world script, never seen it end on the test above).

It was installed with conda:
pytorch 0.2.0 py27hc03bea1_4cu80 [cuda80] soumith

Cannot install pytorch from source, compilation currently fails.

Confirmed that pip fixes it (
pip install --upgrade --force-reinstall http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post3-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
)

body:
Same problem (Pascal, GTX 1060): 
```
import torch
x = torch.randn(4,5)
x.cuda()
```
takes forever (15 minutes in a real-world script, never seen it end on the test above). 

It was installed with conda: 
_pytorch   0.2.0   py27hc03bea1_4cu80  [cuda80]  soumith_

Cannot install pytorch from source, compilation currently fails. 

Confirmed that `pip` fixes it (
_pip install --upgrade --force-reinstall http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post3-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl_
)
